description: This file defines utility functions within the ObjectUtils namespace for creating small JSON boolean string representations, including functions to generate JSON boolean objects and to convert boolean values to JSON boolean literals.

methods.name: std::string CreateBooleanJsonString(const std::string & key,bool value)
methods.description: Creates a JSON string representing a small object with a boolean field, e.g., {"key": true}

methods.name: std::string BoolToJsonString(bool value)
methods.description: Converts a boolean value to its JSON string literal, "true" or "false"

ctags.name: CreateBooleanJsonString
ctags.pattern: /^    inline std::string CreateBooleanJsonString(const std::string& key, bool value) {$/
